p: In sprouted barley and oats the hydrolytic activity of endogenous β-glucanases determined a significant reduction in β-glucans [ 15]. This leaded to a decrease in the total soluble fibers over time, up to 144 h [ 37], and to a different behavior with respect to species characterized by lower β-glucans content, such as wheat, where the amount of soluble fraction remained constant up to 96 h and then increased steadily until 168 h [ 39].
